ISSUE.TITLE: podman cp via STDIN leaves temporary files at tmpdir
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description When a file is copied to a running container with `podman cp` by streaming a tar archive from STDIN, a temporary file is created https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/bde942e21622d489125e3e190988b342e4e7d852/cmd/podman/containers/cp.go#L381 This file is not deleted when the operation is completed causing tmpdir to fills up eventually. ### Steps to reproduce the issue Steps to reproduce the issue 1. Start a test container ``` $ podman run -dt -p 8080:80/tcp docker.io/library/httpd 67c085b8f99fbbe72c86c8d6077d586627c8521858e247a2017a5aaf3cec9d09 ``` 2. Create a tar.gz file and copy it into the test container ``` $ ls -l ls.tar.gz -rw-rw-r--. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:09 ls.tar.gz $ podman cp - 67c085b8f99f:/ < ls.tar.gz ``` 3. When the operation is finished, temporary file is still present at tempdir ``` $ ls -l /var/tmp total 340 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 2002620236 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 2711454316 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 3695615676 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 552526117 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 623461537 ``` ### Describe the results you received Garbage files are present at tempdir ``` $ ls -l /var/tmp total 340 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 2002620236 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 2711454316 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 3695615676 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 552526117 -rw-------. 1 centos centos 66545 Aug 3 12:11 623461537 ``` ### Describe the results you expected I'd expect podman to delete the temporary files when copy operation is finished. ### podman info output ```yaml host: arch: amd64 buildahVersion: 1.30.0 cgroupControllers: [] cgroupManager: cgroupfs cgroupVersion: v1 conmon: package: conmon-2.1.7-1.module_el8+454+d7ef4b8d.x86_64 path: /usr/bin/conmon version: 'conmon version 2.1.7, commit: 6aaf993c7765d6579b6c7d9178f2b00b1691c1f9' cpuUtilization: idlePercent: 93.01 systemPercent: 0.94 userPercent: 6.05 cpus: 1 databaseBackend: boltdb distribution: distribution: '"centos"' version: "8" eventLogger: file idMappings: gidmap: -
